summary: This document is a Certificate of Existence issued by Osbert E. Potter, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands, certifying that JEGE, LLC is duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands. It confirms the company's perpetual duration and that it has paid all applicable fees.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter is the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands who issued the Certificate of Existence for JEGE, LLC.

keyFacts: JEGE, LLC filed Articles of Organization on October 19, 2012.
The company is duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands.
The duration of JEGE, LLC is perpetual.
The company has paid all applicable fees to date.
Articles of Termination have not been filed by the company.
